instructions: Download, then launch the older version of iTunes (12.6.5) on your PC or Mac. Sign in using the same Apple ID as you use on your iPad. Click on iTunes Store at the top of the screen. By default, the iTunes Store usually starts in the Music category. Change the category to the App Store by clicking on the Music category located on the right side of the screen to produce a drop-down menu. Choose App Store in the drop-down menu. Browse apps as you would on your iPad or iPhone. The initial page lists the featured apps, including new apps and currently popular apps. You can use the search feature at the top right of the screen to search for a particular app or change the category of apps by clicking All Categories on the menu. This allows you to choose from specific categories of apps, such as productivity apps or games. Click on an app to get more information on it. Click on the price to buy the app or on Get to download a free app.
